translation.en: [dolphin call] It's go time!
Target is half a klick southwest.
translation.it: Obiettivo a mezzo km a sud-ovest!

translation.en: Don't mess this up, seals.
I don't make mistakes.
Oh? The X47 death balloon.
This one's really deadly. Uh, I'm gonna call a human.
translation.it: È davvero letale. - Chiamo un umano. - No!

translation.en: No. We got this.
Uh, Claggart? You-- You sure we shouldn't get a human?
translation.it: Claggart, non ci serve un umano?

translation.en: I-I feel like we should get a human.
You know, you cut the wrong wire, we'll all be boom! Agh!
translation.it: Se tagli il cavo sbagliato: bum!

translation.en: -The pain! The pain! -Switch! Focus.
-Yeah, focus. Focus. -What's taking so long, Claggart?
translation.it: Mi concentro. Sì. Perché ci metti tanto, Claggart?

translation.en: I got a photoshoot with National Aquatic after this.
translation.it: Ho il servizio con National Aquatic.

translation.en: This isn't as easy as going "Ek-ek-ek-ek-ek," Dolph!
translation.it: Non è facile come fare… Dolph!

translation.en: Ten-hut!
[baby-talk] Do my good boys want some tasty sardines?
translation.it: I miei ragazzi vogliono delle sardine saporite?

translation.en: We don't do this for tasty treats.
translation.it: Non lo facciamo per gli spuntini saporiti.

translation.en: We do this for honor, for duty, for--
translation.it: Lo facciamo per onore, dovere, per…

translation.en: [baby-talk] Yes, you do!
Now, give me a thumbs-up!
[slow-motion] Run!
Claggart, I don't want to die
before... I have... my photoshoot!
translation.it: prima di aver fatto… il servizio fotografico!

translation.en: Oh, wait, I'm a dolphin. I'm totally fine!
translation.it: Aspetta, sono un delfino. Sto benissimo!

translation.en: Brace for impact!
[whispers] So, what's the plan?
Really obvious head-first charge.
Got anything less stupid?
How about the old 1-2-17, back, forward, inside-out maneuver!
translation.it: Manovra uno-due-17, indietro, avanti, dentro e fuori?

translation.en: Yeah, too complicated.
Ooh! Surprise attack!
-Too obvious. -Hm.
Super-secret surprise attack?
Three.
Two...
Super-secret surprise attack!
Quinn, why do you always have to shout out the name of the plan?
translation.it: Quinn, perché gridi sempre il nome del piano?

translation.en: I got carried away. But it was such a good plan. Come on!
translation.it: Mi sono emozionato. Era un piano troppo bello!

translation.en: What are you doing?
There could be you-know-what's lurking out there!
A few ravenous seal-eating sharks
is nothing for the bravest seal in the ocean.
translation.it: non è niente per una foca coraggiosa.

translation.en: I, the Great Geraldo, once escaped from an aquarium
translation.it: Io, il Grande Geraldo, sono scappato da un acquario

translation.en: using only my wits and perfectly symmetrical features.
translation.it: usando solo l'ingegno e i miei lineamenti simmetrici.

translation.en: Have you been waiting for someone to come past so you could tell that story?
Perhaps.
Perhaps not.
It's all part of my mystique.
[Quinn] We can still see you.
Oh, come on. Let's go home.
We'll catch a fish tomorrow.
No. We're gonna get a fish today.
-I don't know, Quinn. -Stay here.
translation.it: Non lo so, Quinn. Resta qui.

translation.en: I'll be back before you can say, "This is a really stupid idea."
translation.it: Tornerò prima che tu dica: "È un'idea davvero stupida".

translation.en: This is a really stupid... Ugh!
Quinn! Wait up!
Come on, man. This is way better than a fish.
translation.it: Dai, bello, è meglio di un pesce.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
-You don't even know what it is. -Oh, come on.
Of course, I do.
It's a super-awesome, um, shiny thingy.
translation.it: È un coso super fantastico e luccicante.

translation.en: -A super-awesome whaty-whaty? -[gasps] Did you see that?
translation.it: Un super fantastico che? L'hai visto?

translation.en: Do you think it would make a difference if I pretend I didn't?
translation.it: Cambia qualcosa, se fingo di no?

translation.en: Who wants to get in my face-hole?
translation.it: Chi vuole entrare nel mio buco in faccia?

translation.en: -Out of the way! -No! Find your own lunch!
translation.it: - Levati! - No! Cercati il tuo pranzo!

translation.en: -Swim for your lives! -We're doomed!
translation.it: Nuotate veloci! - È finita! - Non voglio essere cibo!

translation.en: I don't wanna be food!
translation.it: - È finita! - Non voglio essere cibo!

translation.en: [laughs] Hey, Snap, your face went right into...
translation.it: Snap! La tua faccia è finita nella…

translation.en: Other way, man. Other way!
Are you crazy? There's sharks back there!
translation.it: Sei pazzo? Lo squalo è là dietro!

translation.en: Turn around! Turn around!
Oh. That was too close.
Come on. We're almost home.
I said, you're going in the face-hole!
translation.it: Ho detto che verrete nel mio buco in faccia!

translation.en: No! My face-hole!
Any ideas?
Don't say super-secret surprise attack!
The corkscrew spin!
-You sure about this? -Nope, not at all.
Three... two...
Corkscrew spin!
No wonder they didn't wanna go in your face-hole.
translation.it: So perché non entrano nel tuo buco.

translation.en: It's disgusting in here.
After them!
-[exhales] -[Benji] Quinn?
Yeah?
You shouted out the name of the plan again.
translation.it: Hai urlato il nome del piano, di nuovo!

translation.en: But we totally nailed it that time.
Do you count not catching a fish
and almost being eaten by a shark three times as "nailing it"?
translation.it: ed essere quasi mangiati, per te, è andare alla grande?

translation.en: Yes.
Kinda, sorta, maybe, not really, no not at all.
translation.it: Un po', forse, per niente, decisamente no.

translation.en: Definitely not. That was a complete, total failure.
translation.it: Un po', forse, per niente, decisamente no. È stato un fallimento.

translation.en: -This is my spot! -No, it's mine!
translation.it: Questo posto è mio! No, è mio.

translation.en: Mine, mine, mine.
translation.it: È mio! - Non lo lascio! - È mio!

translation.en: You do know what you did out there was really stupid, right?
translation.it: Sai che hai fatto una cosa stupida?

translation.en: Stupidly worth it! Check it out! We could use them to make light signals!
translation.it: Stupidamente utile. Li useremo per fare segnali luminosi.

translation.en: [yelps] My eyes! My eyes!
I wasn't talking about the thingies.
I meant coming back for me. You could've been eaten.
translation.it: Intendevo tornare per me. Potevano mangiarti.

translation.en: We gotta look out for each other, right?
Yeah. No matter what.
Rah! I'm a seal-eating sharky!
Tag. You're part of the food chain. [chuckles]
translation.it: Presa! Fai parte della catena alimentare.

translation.en: All right, little predator. It's time for dinner.
translation.it: Va bene, piccolo predatore. È ora di cena.

translation.en: Mmm. Barnacles.
-Barnacles! -[both] Ugh!
They taste like sand and disappointment.
And they're particularly disappointy-ish today.
Ugh! There has got to be a better way than this.
Oh, there is. Trick is to lick a rock for flavor.
translation.it: Certo che c'è. Leccare una roccia per il sapore…

translation.en: [slurps] Then stare directly at the sun.
The searing pain removes the disappointment.
translation.it: Il dolore intenso elimina la delusione.

translation.en: Uh... thanks, Beth. But I was talking about all of this.
translation.it: Grazie, Beth, ma parlavo di tutto questo.

translation.en: Risking our lives every day to maybe get a fish?
translation.it: Rischiare la vita ogni giorno per magari prendere un pesce?

translation.en: -I'm so sick of barnacles! -Barnacles are the worst!
Don't worry, seals. It is almost time for the sardine run.
translation.it: Non preoccupatevi, foche. È quasi ora della corsa delle sardine.

translation.en: We'll all get to eat.
-Yeah! -I love sardines!
translation.it: - Adoro le sardine! - Questo elimina i miei timori.

translation.en: -That totally averts any worries I had. -What about the sharks?
translation.it: - Adoro le sardine! - Questo elimina i miei timori. - E gli squali? - Squali?

translation.en: -Sharks? -Good point.
translation.it: Ha ragione! Non ci avevo pensato!

translation.en: -Oh, I did not think of that! -Ha! Hardly a concern.
translation.it: Ha ragione! Non ci avevo pensato! Non preoccupatevi.

translation.en: I can count the amount of sharks I've seen there on one flipper.
translation.it: Posso contare su una pinna gli squali che ho visto.

translation.en: I'd buy that.
-Nothing to worry about. -That's pretty convincing.
-[stomach gurgling] -Quinn?
Yeah?
I really hope we catch more of them awesome shiny thingies tomorrow.
translation.it: Spero che domani prenderemo qualcosa di meglio.

translation.en: I'm so hungry.
What do you think these things really are?
[yawns] Who knows?
All kinds of shipwrecks around here filled with weird human stuff.
translation.it: Ci sono tanti relitti pieni di strane cose umane.

translation.en: Yeah.
My spot.
In your dreams.
He is dreaming.
-What are you doing out here? -I'm gonna get us some food.
translation.it: Che ci fai qui? Cerco da mangiare. È pieno di relitti qui.

translation.en: All kinds of shipwrecks around here, right?
translation.it: Cerco da mangiare. È pieno di relitti qui.

translation.en: And humans never go anywhere without snacks.
translation.it: Gli umani non viaggiano senza snack.

translation.en: Now, go back to sleep.
Breakfast is on me.
Trust me, that's all I wanna do right now.
translation.it: Fidati, è l'unica cosa che voglio fare.

translation.en: Some idiot once told me that we gotta look out for each other.
translation.it: Ma un idiota mi ha detto che dobbiamo aiutarci a vicenda.

translation.en: Well, that guy must have been pretty stupid.
translation.it: Mi sa che è uno stupido.

translation.en: [gasps] Over here.
Humans sure have some interesting snacks.
translation.it: Gli umani hanno degli snack interessanti.

translation.en: -Junk. -Trash.
-Worthless. -Yum!
-[both yelping] -Sideways! Sideways! Attack!
Wow! This is a rough part of the ocean.
[gasps] Tell me about it.
Oh, there's gotta be some food out there.
Yeah, like us, if we go out there.
translation.it: Sì, come noi, se ci andiamo!

translation.en: Come on. We'll be in and out before you can say, "This is a really stupid idea."
translation.it: Usciremo prima che tu possa dire: "È un'idea davvero stupida".

translation.en: This is a really stupid... [sighs] I don't know why I bother.
translation.it: È un'idea davvero… A che serve.

translation.en: What do you think happened...?
Why would you even think about asking a question like that?
translation.it: Perché fai una domanda del genere?

translation.en: Just looking for trouble.
It's just that, you know, this is totally the kind of place that you would find a--
translation.it: È il tipo di posto dove si può trovare uno…

translation.en: -Don't say it! -Oh, relax, man. I'm sure we'll be...
translation.it: Non dirlo! Rilassati. Sono sicuro che…

translation.en: Sorry!
Hello there, little fellas.
-Hello. -Hello.
'Sup?
[chuckles] What's the rush?
I haven't even introduced myself.
My name's Grimes. How are you doing today?
translation.it: Io mi chiamo Grimes. Come state, oggi?

translation.en: -Are you good? -Are you well?
-Are you fine? [laughs] -[exhales]
What? I asked if they was fine.
translation.it: Cosa? Ho chiesto se sono in salute.

translation.en: Like you wanted to pick the scraps off their bones.
Isn't that what we're doing here?
[groans] Obviously, but we don't want them to...
[screams] My eyes!
We can lose them in there!
-Corkscrew spin? -Are you sure?
-Hm. -[sighs] Thought so.
Three.
Two. One!
See? I'm learning! I didn't even shout out the name of the plan!
translation.it: Sto imparando. Non ho gridato il nome del piano!

translation.en: Come on. Come on, come on.
Come on, Benji.
[grunts] Benji!
-Did he just...? -No ways.
You're food.
You're food!
[grunts] No! No! Stop it!
translation.it: No! Smettila! Questo è troppo umiliante!

translation.en: This is so undignifying!
This is what happens when you go up against the food chain.
translation.it: È ciò che succede quando sfidi la catena alimentare.

translation.en: Food chain can kiss my tailfin.
translation.it: La catena alimentare può baciarmi la pinna caudale.

translation.en: -Hm? -No! You can't eat him! I thought you'd learned your lesson!
translation.it: No! Non si mangia! Pensavo avessi imparato la lezione!

translation.en: So, so sorry. We thought you were, oh, you know...
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Pensavamo che fossi, sai…

translation.en: KIA, roger.
My name is Diving Dee. This is Roger.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Diving Dee. - Lui è Roger. - Roger.

translation.en: -Roger. -That eloquent lady is Mayday.
Is she all right?
Yeah, she's been trying to eat that starfish for years.
translation.it: Cerca di mangiare quella stella marina da anni.

translation.en: I think they've formed a symbiotic relationship.
I'm Quinn.
Well, Quinn, what brings your unconscious body to these waters?
translation.it: Cosa porta il tuo corpo privo di sensi in queste acque?

translation.en: I went looking for food with my friend. Benji.
translation.it: Cercavo cibo con il mio amico. Benji.

translation.en: [gasps] An old seal. He saved me from a shark.
translation.it: Una vecchia foca. Mi ha salvato da uno squalo.

translation.en: Big mustache. Angry. Face like this.
-Ooh, Claggart. -Roger.
You know where I can find him?
You're probably safer going back to the shark.
translation.it: È meglio che torni dallo squalo.

translation.en: That old grouch does not like visitors. Nope.
translation.it: Quel brontolone non ama i visitatori. Ma gli piace infliggergli dolore.

translation.en: He does seem to enjoy inflicting pain on them, though.
Oh, well, it's nice having known ya, Quinn.
Enjoy the last few moments of your short, short life.
translation.it: Goditi la fine della tua breve vita!

translation.en: Over and out. Over.
You have exactly ten seconds to get off my ship
before I teach you the meaning of pain.
translation.it: o ti insegnerò cos'è il dolore.

translation.en: Ten, unbelievable pain.
Nine, ridiculous pain.
Eight, worse pain.
The way you took on that shark. How did you do that?
translation.it: - Hai attaccato uno squalo. - Sette, dolore inimmaginabile. Come hai fatto?

translation.en: Ha! Basic flipper-to-flipper combat.
Could you teach me?
[sighs] That's what my crew used to call an RSI.
translation.it: La mia squadra chiamava così una IDS.

translation.en: A really stupid idea!
Why would you wanna throw your life away?
The other super awesome shiny thingy.
translation.it: L'altro coso super fantastico e luccicante.

translation.en: The whata-whata-whata-whaty?
It belonged to my best friend.
Oh. I see.
Well, it's a cold, dark, cut-the-wrong-wire -on-a-naval-mine-
translation.it: È un freddo, buio, "Taglia il cavo sbagliato

translation.en: and-get-your-whole-team-disbanded kind of ocean out there, pup.
translation.it: e smantella il tuo team" oceano.

translation.en: Weirdly specific.
It's best to go home, move on with your life,
translation.it: È meglio che tu vada a casa, continui la tua vita

translation.en: and leave complete strangers alone!
translation.it: e lasci in pace gli estranei!

translation.en: The only way you're getting rid of me is to teach me how to fight.
translation.it: Per sbarazzarti di me, devi insegnarmi a combattere!

translation.en: Or throw me off this boat.
-Oh. -I--I phrased that badly. I phrased that badly!
That lesson's for free. Now get lost.
Teach me or the sardines are gonna get it.
You wouldn't dare.
Oh. Wouldn't I?
translation.it: Non ne avresti il coraggio. No?

translation.en: Not the Tsardines! Do you have any idea how difficult it is to get those?
translation.it: Non le Zardine! Sai quant'è difficile prenderle?

translation.en: More than anyone.
Come with me.
My years in the service taught me
that this is what you need to accomplish any mission.
translation.it: che questo è ciò che serve per portare a termine una missione.

translation.en: -A photo? -No! In the photo!
A dolphin smoking a cigar?
translation.it: Un delfino che fuma un sigaro?

translation.en: A team of soldiers,
brave, stupid, or crazy enough to follow you into any mission.
translation.it: coraggiosi, stupidi o abbastanza folli da seguirti in ogni missione,

translation.en: No matter how dangerous.
You mean, I should form some kind of seal ensemble?
translation.it: Dovrei formare un complesso di foche!

translation.en: -Wanna sing acapella? -Seal club?
You obviously haven't been to the Arctic.
Wait. I've got it.
translation.it: - Non sei stato nell'Artico. - Aspetta. Ho un'idea!

translation.en: Flipper Patrol!
Have fun with the sharks!
My name is Seal. You seals have been an amazing audience.
translation.it: Io sono Seal. Siete un pubblico fantastico.

translation.en: Now, this is the part of the evening where I want you all to sing along. Say, "Arf, arf, arf, arf, arf."
translation.it: Questa è la parte della serata in cui canterete insieme. Dite…

translation.en: Now say, "Arf, arf, arf, arf, arf. Arf. Arf!"
Arf, arf, arf, arf, arf! Arf! Arf!
Now say... Quinn?
[all] Quinn?
-Where have you been? -[all] Where have you been?
translation.it: Dove sei stato? Dove sei stato?

translation.en: Cut it out!
Benji and I went to...
translation.it: Benji e io siamo andati a…

translation.en: [sighs] There was a shark.
Well, it's best to forget about all that and have a barnacle.
translation.it: È meglio dimenticare tutto e mangiare un cirripede.

translation.en: No! I am so sick of disgusting barnacles.
translation.it: - No! - La mia testa! Sono stufo di cirripedi disgustosi!

translation.en: Don't worry. There's always the...
What, the sardine run? Please!
translation.it: La corsa delle sardine? Per favore!

translation.en: We all just go into the water and hope that we're faster than the next seal.
translation.it: Tutti in acqua, sperando di essere più veloci degli altri.

translation.en: Aren't you tired of leaving your friends behind?
translation.it: Non siete stanchi di perdere gli amici?

translation.en: I hate to bring up the painfully obvious, but it's a shark-eat-seal world out there, right?
translation.it: Odio dire cose scontate, ma è un mondo squalo-mangia-foca.

translation.en: Every seal for themselves. If it's between him or me, I'm choosing me.
translation.it: - Ogni foca per sé! - Tra lui o me, scelgo me.

translation.en: You jerk! I thought we were friends!
-My spot! -I've been sitting here for years!
translation.it: - È il mio posto! - Sono qui da anni!

translation.en: Well, I'm through running.
I'm gonna make sure we never lose another seal.
-I'm gonna fight back. -[gasping]
Is there anyone here brave, stupid, or crazy enough to help me?
translation.it: C'è qualcuno così coraggioso, stupido o pazzo da aiutarmi?

translation.en: Actually, this isn't my spot. You can have it.
translation.it: Non è il mio posto. Prendilo tu.

translation.en: Not even Crazy Steve is that crazy.
translation.it: Nemmeno Steve il pazzo è così pazzo.

translation.en: And a shark once spat him out because he tasted too weird.
translation.it: E uno squalo l'ha sputato perché aveva un sapore strano.

translation.en: All right, back to the music.
Please! Stop! You guys gotta listen to me.
♪ Quinn is never gonna survive ♪
♪ Because he's a little crazy ♪
Those stupid seals.
Not even stupid enough to fight sharks.
translation.it: Neanche così stupide da combattere gli squali.

translation.en: Thanks, Beth.
But it's gonna take more than rocks and searing pain to help me.
translation.it: Ma non mi bastano rocce e dolore.

translation.en: You need seals brave, stupid, or crazy enough to fight sharks.
translation.it: Servono foche coraggiose, stupide o pazze per combattere gli squali.

translation.en: You were there. How'd it go? Scale of one to ten?
translation.it: C'eri? Com'è andata? Da uno a dieci.

translation.en: Oh, Quinn.
They haven't invented a number low enough to describe that.
translation.it: Non c'è un numero abbastanza basso.

translation.en: But look on the bright side-- if you want to fight sharks, you're obviously very, very stupid.
translation.it: Il lato positivo è che se sfidi gli squali, sei stupido.

translation.en: So you're already a third of the way to forming your own team.
translation.it: Perciò hai già un terzo del tuo team.

translation.en: Yeah, you're right.
All I need is someone brave and someone...
translation.it: Mi serve solo qualcuno coraggioso e…

translation.en: Me?
Yeah! You're always helping others! By forcing them to lick rocks.
translation.it: - Io? - Sì! Costringi tutti a leccare le rocce

translation.en: And you stare directly at the sun for hours, so you gotta be tough.
translation.it: e fissi il sole per ore. Sei una tosta.

translation.en: I do have a lot of skills.
But fighting sharks is a little certain death-y for my taste.
translation.it: ma combattere gli squali è un po' mortale per i miei gusti.

translation.en: I'll get you all the sardines you can eat.
translation.it: Ti darò un sacco di sardine.

translation.en: If you really wanna die a horrible death involving sharks,
translation.it: Se vuoi essere ucciso dagli squali,

translation.en: I'm gonna help you achieve your goal.
Yes! Thanks! I think.
All we need now is someone brave.
Oh, easy. I know the bravest seal in the ocean.
translation.it: Conosco la foca più coraggiosa dell'oceano.

translation.en: Wow, it's a little cold tonight, hm?
Hm, it is a bit chilly.
A slightly chilly evening
is nothing for the bravest seal in the ocean.
translation.it: non è niente per la foca più coraggiosa dell'oceano.

translation.en: What about fighting sharks?
Fighting sharks is noth... Actually, it is quite something.
translation.it: Combattere gli squali non è nie… È una cosa seria.

translation.en: You brave enough to help us do it?
Me? Brave enough?
I laugh in the face of danger so much danger says to me,
translation.it: Rido così tanto davanti al pericolo che mi dice: "Grande Geraldo, mi offendi".

translation.en: "Oh, Great Geraldo, you hurt my feelings."
translation.it: che mi dice: "Grande Geraldo, mi offendi".

translation.en: And then I hold danger in my arms and I say,
translation.it: Poi, lo tengo tra le braccia e dico:

translation.en: "Sorry, I never meant to hurt you."
So is that a yes on fighting the sharks?
translation.it: Quindi, è un "sì" a combattere gli squali?

translation.en: -Perhaps. Perhaps not. -All a part of your mystique, huh?
translation.it: Forse sì, forse no. Fa parte del tuo fascino?

translation.en: [chuckles] You're a fast learner. I like you.
Uh, one question? How do we fight the sharks?
translation.it: Una domanda. Come combattiamo gli squali?

translation.en: The Great Geraldo also wonders about this.
translation.it: Anche il Grande Geraldo se lo chiede.

translation.en: But does not care about the answer!
I have no idea, but I know a seal who does.
translation.it: Io non ne ho idea… ma c'è una foca che lo sa.

translation.en: I found seals brave, stupid, and, uh, "Beth" enough
translation.it: Ho le foche coraggiose, stupide e Beth

translation.en: to follow me into this mission.
Now will you train us?
You're persistent, pup, I'll give you that.
translation.it: Sei tenace, cucciolo. Te lo concedo.

translation.en: But only that!
This is the most blubbery, pathetic mess of a team I've ever seen!
translation.it: È il team più patetico che abbia mai visto!

translation.en: You don't look so hot yourself, walrus.
[scoffs] And insubordinate, too? Forget about it!
translation.it: Siete anche insubordinati? Niente da fare!

translation.en: No. If you don't teach us how to fight,
translation.it: No! Se non ci insegni a combattere,

translation.en: we're gonna eat every can of sardines on this entire ship.
translation.it: mangeremo tutte le scatole di sardine che hai sulla nave.

translation.en: I can't promise I won't do that anyway.
translation.it: Non prometto che non lo farò comunque.

translation.en: His mystique, it's... magnificent!
So, you pups think you have what it takes to be in the HMMF?
translation.it: Avete le carte in regola per entrare nell'M.M.F?

translation.en: -Wait, your team was called "hmmf"? -Hmmf!
translation.it: Il tuo team si chiamava M.M.F?

translation.en: Kinda makes sense, I suppose.
It stands for Hydro-Marine Military Force,
the most elite fighting animals ever to swim in the ocean.
And I don't think you have what it takes.
You gotta be fighting fit, on land...
translation.it: Dovete essere in forma perfetta. Sulla terra…

translation.en: and in the water.
You gotta have discipline.
-You ready to quit? -[all] Seal, no, seal!
translation.it: Pronti a mollare? Signor foca, no!

translation.en: A lie-down would be nice, though.
[Claggart] You gotta be a master of stealth.
Who said that? [screams]
You gotta learn how to do a thumbs-up.
translation.it: Imparerete a fare il pollice in su.

translation.en: Yeah, we'll come back to this one.
You're gonna need...
translation.it: - Ci vorrà… - Supporto aereo per individuare i nemici!

translation.en: -Air support to spot the enemy! -Roger that. Over.
translation.it: - Ci vorrà… - Supporto aereo per individuare i nemici! Ricevuto. Chiudo.

translation.en: Shoo, you stupid birds! This is my training!
translation.it: Sciò, stupidi uccelli! È il mio addestramento!

translation.en: Now, where were we?
You were gonna ask if we're ready to quit. And we were gonna say...
translation.it: Volevi chiedere se ci arrenderemo e stavamo per dire…

translation.en: -[all] Seal, no, seal! -Hmmf!
You're gonna learn pain.
More pain.
Pain! Pain, pain, pain, pain!
Pain! Pain.
You ready to quit?
Never!
Huh, you might just be HMMF material after all.
Hmmf!
That's the spirit! But you still have to pass the final test.
translation.it: Questo è lo spirito! Ma dovete superare il test finale.

translation.en: What test?
Fighting a shark, of course.
Meet the fiercest predator in the ocean.
translation.it: Vi presento il predatore più feroce.

translation.en: An inanimate object is no match-- [yelps]
translation.it: Un oggetto inanimato non ha chance…

translation.en: Is that all you've got?
Internal hemorrhaging is no mat--
Bob! Please stop!
One down, two to go. Next!
translation.it: Uno a terra, ne restano due. Il prossimo!

translation.en: How did she...?
The secret is the element of surprise-- [yelps]
translation.it: Il mio segreto è la sorpresa.

translation.en: [laughs] Bob, two! Cheeky pups, zero!
Now hurry up and fail. I've got a military-grade nap to get to.
translation.it: Sbrigati a fallire. Devo fare un pisolino di alta qualità.

translation.en: [sighs] A seal is no match for a shark.
translation.it: Una foca non ha chance contro uno squalo.

translation.en: That's why we gotta work together.
-Come on, guys. -Hey! They've had their turn!
translation.it: Perciò dobbiamo collaborare. Forza! Loro l'hanno già fatto!

translation.en: You said it yourself.
You can only achieve your mission with a photo.
translation.it: "Puoi realizzare la missione solo con una foto"!

translation.en: I mean, a team.
Three. Two. One!
Not bad, pups. Not bad. Now get some shut-eye.
translation.it: Non male, cuccioli. Non male. Ora, andate a dormire. Domani, vi aspetta altro d-o-l-o-r-e.

translation.en: You're in for more P-A-I-N tomorrow.
translation.it: Ora, andate a dormire. Domani, vi aspetta altro d-o-l-o-r-e.

translation.en: -P-A-I-... -That one just means pain.
Bad boy! Bad, bad boy!
-What are you doing out here, pup? -Nothing.
translation.it: Che ci fai qui, cucciolo? Niente. Non riesco a dormire. Penso alle strategie.

translation.en: Can't sleep. Coming up with, uh, strategies.
translation.it: Niente. Non riesco a dormire. Penso alle strategie.

translation.en: What are you doing out here?
Same thing.
Is it even possible?
Fighting sharks?
Well, it's stupid and will probably end in death.
But that never stopped my old team from diving into action.
translation.it: ma questo non ha mai impedito al mio team di agire.

translation.en: Uh, doesn't seem like that ended super well.
translation.it: Non sembra che sia finita bene.

translation.en: Yeah. What happened to the rest of your team?
There was an accident, and HMMF was disbanded.
translation.it: Ci fu un incidente e l'M.M.F venne sciolto.

translation.en: Dolph went into show business.
And our gear expert, Switch, he went crazy.
translation.it: e l'esperto di attrezzature, Switch, impazzì.

translation.en: -Gear expert? -Well, more crazy.
translation.it: Esperto. - Diventò più pazzo. - Tanto da combattere gli squali?

translation.en: Crazy enough to fight sharks?
translation.it: - Diventò più pazzo. - Tanto da combattere gli squali?

translation.en: Forget it. Not gonna happen, pup.
translation.it: Lascia stare! Non se ne parla.

translation.en: I already led him on one starfish-brained mission.
translation.it: L'avevo già guidato in una missione strampalata.

translation.en: I'm not gonna do it again.
Okay, you leave me no choice, then.
translation.it: Ok, non mi lasci altra scelta.

translation.en: -Hey! Give those back! -Or what?
Teach me all of your moves? Military mistake of the century!
translation.it: Mi insegni le tue mosse? L'errore militare del secolo!

translation.en: I don't get it. Your old teammates are out there,
translation.it: Non capisco. I tuoi vecchi compagni sono là fuori, ma tu stai qui col broncio.

translation.en: but you just sulk here by yourself.
translation.it: I tuoi vecchi compagni sono là fuori, ma tu stai qui col broncio.

translation.en: I would do anything to see Benji again.
translation.it: Io farei di tutto per rivedere Benji.

translation.en: Pick up the pace! Stragglers will be left behind!
translation.it: Veloci! Chi resta indietro sarà abbandonato!

translation.en: Then captured. Then left behind again. Then recaptured.
translation.it: Poi catturato e riabbandonato! Ricatturato! Preso a colpi di coda! Poi abbandonato!

translation.en: Then tail-slapped. Then left behind.
translation.it: Ricatturato! Preso a colpi di coda! Poi abbandonato!

translation.en: Wow, he's particularly hmmf-ish today.
He's just nervous because we're gonna see an old friend of his.
translation.it: È nervoso perché andiamo da un suo vecchio amico.

translation.en: The Great Geraldo also knows this pain.
translation.it: Anche il Grande Geraldo conosce questo dolore.

translation.en: When I escaped from the aquarium,
using only my wits and perfectly symmetrical features,
translation.it: usando l'ingegno e i lineamenti perfetti,

translation.en: I had to leave my one true love behind:
translation.it: abbandonai il mio unico vero amore.

translation.en: Magnificent Jing!
Shut it, seal! Anything could be listening.
You mean like the biggest shark you've ever seen in your whole life?
translation.it: Intendi lo squalo più grande che tu abbia mai visto?

translation.en: Hi. I'm Dave.
Uh... are you gonna eat us?
Nah. I'm a basking shark.
I only eat plankton.
And one time, a little wooden boy by mistake.
translation.it: E una volta, un bambino di legno per sbaglio.

translation.en: He really liked to sing.
But that's cool 'cause I really like to sing, too.
translation.it: Ma è bello, perché anche a me piace cantare!

translation.en: My favorite song is the one that goes...
What's that one called again?
Wow. There's worse things a shark can do than eat you.
translation.it: Uno squalo può fare cose peggiori che mangiarti.

translation.en: We're here.
Hold it right there or you're gonna get...
the shrimp.
Hello, Switch.
Claggart? Is that really you?
I haven't seen you since... Boom! Agh!
Yeah, I know.
Oh, Claggy!
It's been too long, my old friend.
It's good to see you, too, Switch.
Sheesh, what's it with you HMMF seals living alone on spooky wrecks?
translation.it: Come mai voi foche M.M.F vivete da sole su relitti spettrali?

translation.en: Oh, I'm not alone. No, no, no. I stay with my old friend, Señor Echo.
translation.it: Non sono solo. C'è il mio amico, señor Eco.

translation.en: Is that just your echo?
No! No, he's a sophisticated but aloof gentleman.
translation.it: No! È un gentiluomo sofisticato, ma distaccato.

translation.en: Señor Echo, say, "Hi, everyone!"
[echoes] Hi, everyone! Everyone! Everyone! Everyone!
Wait, wait, wait, wait. Are you...? Is this...?
Is the HMMF getting back together?
Uh, not quite. We formed a team to fight sharks.
translation.it: - Non proprio. - È un team per sfidare gli squali.

translation.en: That's a serious RSI. Did you tell him that's an RSI?
translation.it: È una IDS. Gli hai detto che è una IDS?

translation.en: Kinda why we're here. We're gonna need some heavy firepower.
translation.it: Ecco perché siamo qui. Ci servono delle armi pesanti.

translation.en: Hm. I don't have access to the HMMF armory anymore.
translation.it: Non ho più accesso all'armeria M.M.F.

translation.en: So I've had to improvise.
With some unstable experimental biotechnology!
[echoes] Unstable experimental biotechnology! Gy-gy-gy!
They know, Señor Echo. They know, they know. I just told them.
translation.it: Lo sanno, Señor Eco! Gliel'ho detto.

translation.en: [Señor Echo] Oh, sorry! My bad! Bad! Bad! Bad!
Clam grenades! Ow!
translation.it: Granate vongole! Che cavolo… Scusate… Attenti!

translation.en: Oh, excuse... Watch out! Watch out!
Electric eel bolts. Just what you need.
translation.it: Bulloni elettrici. Quello che ci serve.

translation.en: Puffer mines!
Watches! For synchronizing.
Um... what is this?
I love you. Ugh!
Barazooka!
Yeah. Well, um, that one works, uh, works better underwater.
And you've already seen the pistol shrimp.
translation.it: E avete già visto il gamberetto pistola.

translation.en: -Ah! He's kinda cute! -No!
Are you insane? That's one of the most dangerous weapons here.
translation.it: Sei pazzo? È una delle armi più pericolose.

translation.en: One click of his claw and pow!
translation.it: Un clic delle chele e bum!

translation.en: Anywho, moving swiftly on.
Now this one is super exciting. This is my latest project.
translation.it: Questo è super eccitante. È il mio ultimo progetto.

translation.en: Activate Octo Suit.
[Echo] Embarrassing! Embarrassing! Embarrassing!
Oh, sorry. You've gotta do the voice. They love the voice.
translation.it: Scusa. Devi fare la voce. Adorano la voce.

translation.en: [deep voice] Activate Octo Suit.
Flicka... Flicka, stop it, no. Not now.
This one's still in the R&D stage. Um... [chuckle]
translation.it: È in fase di ricerca e sviluppo.

translation.en: This is seven, five, one, niner. Bogey identified at 12 o'clock. Over.
translation.it: Qui Sette, Cinque, Uno, Nove. Velivolo non identificato a ore 12, passo.

translation.en: Roger, we're right here! Can't you just speak normally for once?
translation.it: Roger! Siamo qui! Non puoi parlare normalmente?

translation.en: [sighs] Never mind.
Compensating for angle.
Calculating distance.
And... Eels away!
Okay, let's tie this up.
-[gasping] -No way!
-Did they just...? -I don't believe it!
Now what?
Go, Seals! You can do it! You show her!
translation.it: Forza, foche! Ce la farete! Fategliela vedere!

translation.en: I've lost all faith in you guys!
translation.it: - Ho perso la fiducia in voi! - Ogni foca per sé!

translation.en: Pull right!
Hey, should we... go after them?
Sure. I'll be right behind you.
If this thing gets us into deep water, we're in, uh, deep water!
translation.it: Se questo coso ci porta giù, andremo a fondo.

translation.en: Ooh! We could trap her in a shark cage!
-[Beth] That isn't a real thing! -[Quinn] Yeah, it is!
translation.it: Non è una cosa vera. Sì, invece.

translation.en: -Are you sure this'll work? -Not at all.
I'll take it.
We are currently floating in the Zone of Death.
translation.it: Stiamo fluttuando nella Zona della Morte.

translation.en: Home of flying great white sharks!
translation.it: Casa dei grandi squali bianchi volanti!

translation.en: -[phone trills] -Yeah, right. -Believe it when I see it. -[splash]
translation.it: - Sì. - Ci crederò quando lo vedrò.

translation.en: -[phone trills] -[grunts] Come on, people!
What kind of a cheapskate shark cage is this?
translation.it: Che razza di gabbia per squali è?

translation.en: There is no way that a shark could fit in there! No way!
translation.it: Uno squalo non ci entra! Impossibile!

translation.en: -[angry grunts] -Oh, she's cagey.
You're funny. I like you.
That's why I'm gonna eat you last.
Ah, put a clam in it.
-Call him. -Grimes.
Oh, that's totally cheating! [yelps]
What are you doing in my territory?
translation.it: Che ci fate nel mio territorio?

translation.en: -Mr. Grimes, sir. -Yes, sir.
We saw a group of seals attacking a shark.
translation.it: Un gruppo di foche ha attaccato uno squalo.

translation.en: -And what did you do about it? -[both] Uh...
We came to tell you we saw a group of seals attacking a shark?
translation.it: Siamo venuti a dirle che delle foche hanno attaccato uno squalo?

translation.en: You got chased away by food?
You don't understand. They got weird gadgets.
translation.it: Lei non capisce. Hanno strani gadget!

translation.en: Crazy moves!
Ever-growing camaraderie.
We're no match for that. We're barely even friends!
translation.it: Non abbiamo chance. Siamo a malapena amici!

translation.en: Get a grip of yourselves! You're sharks!
translation.it: Datevi una calmata! Siete degli squali!

translation.en: Now, tell me more about these seals.
translation.it: Ditemi di più su queste foche.

translation.en: -Well, they had one of those. -One of what?
translation.it: Avevano uno di quelli. Uno di cosa?

translation.en: That super awesome-looking shiny thingy.
translation.it: Un coso super fantastico e luccicante.

translation.en: The food that lived.
This is bad.
For all of us.
First it's seals fighting back.
Next thing you know, we'll have penguins pecking at our eyes.
translation.it: Poi, i pinguini ci beccheranno gli occhi! No!

translation.en: -Dolphins on the counterattack? -But they look so friendly.
translation.it: Delfini al contrattacco? Ma sembrano amichevoli.

translation.en: -A sea otter uprising! -Ooh, I'd like to see that, actually.
translation.it: Una lontra marina che si ribella! Mi piacerebbe vederla.

translation.en: So... what are we gonna do?
We make an example of them.
Seals are doing what?
-[whispers] -How dare they!
What?
We'll show them.
-[whispers] -That is ridiculous!
Oh, yes, of course, I know seals attacked a shark.
translation.it: So che le foche hanno attaccato uno squalo.

translation.en: -How do you think I got here? -All right, sorry.
translation.it: Come credi sia finita qui? Giusto. Scusa.

translation.en: Oh, nothing to see here. Go back to sleep. Go back to sleep.
translation.it: Niente da vedere. Tornate a dormire.

translation.en: -I'm too talented to be eaten! -[comical chatter]
translation.it: Ho troppo talento per essere mangiato!

translation.en: Mommy, help me!
All right, seals, your next mission is to party!
translation.it: Ok, foche. La prossima missione è far festa!

translation.en: We took down a shark and didn't die!
translation.it: Abbiamo attaccato uno squalo e siamo vive!

translation.en: -Let's see what you got. -[chittering]
Let's bust up the dance floor HMMF style.
translation.it: Andiamo in pista. In stile M.M.F.

translation.en: What's wrong, pup?
Moping around in the shadows is the one move I didn't want to teach you.
translation.it: Deprimermi nell'ombra è una mossa che non volevo insegnarti.

translation.en: Oh, nothing. It's just seeing you guys.
It reminded you of your friend.
translation.it: Ti ha ricordato il tuo amico.

translation.en: Benji wasn't a friend. He was a TBFITEO.
translation.it: Benji non era un amico. Era un IMADTO.

translation.en: The Best Friend In The Entire Ocean.
translation.it: Il Migliore Amico Di Tutto l'Oceano.

translation.en: See? We'll make a military seal out of you yet.
translation.it: Visto? Faremo di te una foca militare.

translation.en: Benji was loyal, brave.
Telling me how stupid my ideas were.
translation.it: a dirmi che le mie idee erano stupide.

translation.en: Looking out for me, no matter what.
translation.it: Mi aiutava sempre, a ogni costo.

translation.en: [sighs] That really is a TBFITEO.
And... he paid the price for it.
translation.it: E ne ha pagato il prezzo.

translation.en: Sharks!
They've surrounded Seal Island!
Though it could be they just want a little chit-chat,
but I think you guys made them really angry.
-Roger. -[exclaims]
Gear up, team. We're heading out.
That's a serious RSI, pup! We barely survived a fight with one shark!
translation.it: È una IDS. Siamo sopravvissuti a malapena a uno squalo!

translation.en: If we caused this, we have to fix it.
translation.it: Se siamo stati noi, dobbiamo rimediare.

translation.en: Not by just rushing in blindly. That's how you get your friends hurt.
translation.it: Non agendo d'impulso. Così rischi la vita dei tuoi amici.

translation.en: Wait, Quinn, uh...
I'm gonna save those seals, with or without your help.
translation.it: salverò quelle foche con o senza di te.

translation.en: Wait, pup.
-[screams] -No! My canapés!
How could you do this?
Quinn! I was talking about me.
The accident that destroyed the Good Boy...
translation.it: L'incidente che ha distrutto il Good Boy…

translation.en: it was my fault.
I cut the wrong wire on a mine because...
translation.it: Ho tagliato il filo sbagliato di una mina…

translation.en: because I'm colorblind!
Um... all seals are colorblind.
-What? -Uh-huh.
Yeah, for all I know, our camouflage could be bright pink.
translation.it: Il camuffamento potrebbe essere rosa shocking.

translation.en: Oh, man. I gotta rethink everything.
You sure? Whoo!
All right, all right, all right. [exhales]
I'm okay.
Ah! I threw my life away!
translation.it: Ho buttato via la mia vita!

translation.en: [screams] It's ruined everything!
Pull it together.
The point is I was proud, overconfident. And I rushed in without thinking.
translation.it: Ero orgoglioso. Troppo sicuro. E ho agito senza pensare.

translation.en: My crew... my friends... they paid the price.
translation.it: Il mio team, i miei amici. Ne hanno pagato il prezzo.

translation.en: Ah, come on. It's water under the exploded bridge.
We all make mistakes, right?
But you don't have to make the same ones I did.
translation.it: Ma voi non dovete fare gli stessi errori.

translation.en: So, what do we do?
The seals are trapped over here on Sentinel Rock.
translation.it: Le foche sono bloccate a Sentinel Rock.

translation.en: There are sharks here, here, here, here, here.
translation.it: Ci sono squali qui, qui, qui. Un po' qui.

translation.en: Little bit over here. This one, no, don't go there.
translation.it: Ci sono squali qui, qui, qui. Un po' qui. Questo? No, non andate lì.

translation.en: There's a shark here, here, here.
There was a baby shark over here. Doo-doo-doo-doo.
translation.it: C'era un cucciolo di squalo qui.

translation.en: Uh, Mommy shark here. Yep, a shark here.
translation.it: Mamma squalo qui. Uno squalo qui.

translation.en: Grandpa shark over here. He did not look very happy.
translation.it: Nonno squalo qui. Non sembrava felice. Uno era…

translation.en: -There was a shark-- -Okay, we get it!
translation.it: Nonno squalo qui. Non sembrava felice. Uno era… Abbiamo capito!

translation.en: We got eight hours before the tide comes in.
We need to rescue those seals without engaging the sharks.
translation.it: Dobbiamo salvarle senza disturbare gli squali.

translation.en: Sounds like a job for the... [deep voice] Octo Suit.
Yeah, probably an RSI.
I think I have something else that could work!
My special formula chum.
Irresistible for sharks. One drop will lure them all away from the island.
translation.it: Irresistibile! Una goccia li allontanerà dall'isola.

translation.en: The sharks are gonna be on us as soon as we put that stuff in the water.
translation.it: Appena sarà nell'acqua, verranno da noi.

translation.en: We need a boat.
Not this boat, though, right?
-Hey, the Good Boy can still sail. -[clank]
translation.it: La Good Boy può ancora navigare!

translation.en: You mean in reality, or in our hearts and minds?
translation.it: Nella realtà o nel cuore e nella mente?

translation.en: The Great Geraldo knows where we can get a boat.
translation.it: Il Grande Geraldo sa dove trovarne una.

translation.en: The harbor near my old aquarium.
translation.it: Un porto vicino al mio vecchio acquario.

translation.en: It's the last place I saw my great love, the Magnificent Jing,
translation.it: L'ultimo posto dove vidi il mio grande amore, la Magnifica Jing,

translation.en: before I escaped using only my wits.
translation.it: prima di fuggire usando solo l'ingegno…

translation.en: All right! We've got our plan.
Get a boat, chum the water, and rescue the seals.
translation.it: Trovate una nave, buttate l'esca e salvate le foche.

translation.en: Synchronized watches, in three, two, one.
translation.it: Sincronizzate gli orologi al tre, due, uno.

translation.en: I love you.
I really hate this thing.
-Hey! What are you doing here? -Locals only!
translation.it: Ehi! Che ci fate qui? Solo locali.

translation.en: -Get lost, bruh. -Hmmf. Harbor seals.
No honor, no bravery.
They just laze around doing tricks for snacks.
translation.it: Si esibiscono in cambio di snack.

translation.en: You think you can just roll into our territory and insult us?
translation.it: Venite nel nostro territorio a insultarci?

translation.en: We'll show you.
Summon... the Harbor Queen!
Summon the Harbor Queen!
translation.it: La regina del porto! Chiamate la regina del porto!

translation.en: Uh, who's the Harbor Queen?
translation.it: Chiamate la regina del porto! Chi è la regina?

translation.en: I don't know, but she sounds kinda dangerous.
translation.it: Chi è la regina? Non lo so. Sembra pericolosa.

translation.en: Eh, what's she gonna do, spin a ball on her nose?
translation.it: Farà girare una palla sul naso?

translation.en: Give it up. You are no match for the Great Geraldo.
translation.it: Arrenditi. Non hai chance con il Grande Geraldo.

translation.en: It is you who is no match
translation.it: Sei tu che non hai chance…

translation.en: for the Magnificent Jing!
We need a song to lift our spirits.
Report back to Grimes.
Yes. Tell her to join the attack from the north.
translation.it: Sì. Dille di unirsi all'attacco da nord.

translation.en: Huh? What do you mean he's lost? Sharks have a built-in navigation system.
translation.it: Si è perso? Gli squali hanno un sistema di navigazione integrato.

translation.en: [sighs] Fine. Left at the reef, right at the canyon.
translation.it: Alla barriera a sinistra, al canyon a destra,

translation.en: And he can't miss it. [grunts]
If you give me bad news, I will eat you right now.
translation.it: Se mi dai brutte notizie, ti mangerò subito.

translation.en: [sighs] Just spit it out already.
The news!
The tide's almost up, but still no sign of them pesky action seals.
translation.it: Sta per arrivare l'alta marea, ma le foche moleste non ci sono.

translation.en: Doesn't matter.
As long as they stay out of my way, the plan will proceed.
translation.it: Finché saranno lontane, il piano andrà avanti.

translation.en: And if they do show up?
Save a bite of the cheeky one for me.
translation.it: Lasciami un pezzo di quella impertinente.

translation.en: No! Right at the reef! Right!
translation.it: No! A destra alla barriera! A destra!

translation.en: Jing! My love!
Geraldo!
You useless, good-for-nothing, self-involved coward!
translation.it: Incapace, buono a nulla, codardo egocentrico!

translation.en: Hold up, is this the Jing? The one who escaped from the aquarium?
translation.it: È la famosa Jing? Che è scappata dall'acquario?

translation.en: [all] "Using only his wits and perfectly symmetrical features."
translation.it: Usando solo l'ingegno e i lineamenti simmetrici.

translation.en: "Escaped"?
The Magnificent Jing laughs with all the sarcasm she can muster.
translation.it: La Magnifica Jing ride con tutto il sarcasmo che conosce.

translation.en: The Great Geraldo notes your sarcasm, but does not appreciate it.
translation.it: Il Grande Geraldo nota il sarcasmo, ma non lo apprezza.

translation.en: Ugh. Two of them. Help me.
Please, my love, we do not have time for this.
translation.it: Amore! Non c'è tempo per questo.

translation.en: No one is going anywhere until he tells the truth.
translation.it: Nessuno va via, finché lui non dice la verità!

translation.en: -I... -Please be dramatic.
Escaping the aquarium was Jing's plan.
translation.it: Evadere dall'acquario era il piano di Jing,

translation.en: -But I... I couldn't go through with it! -[all gasp]
translation.it: ma io non ce l'ho fatta!

translation.en: I am not disappointed.

Were . Past tense.

[TV] By day, Burt "Flips" Flipsburton is a millionaire dolphin philanthropist.

certainly die with me?

[laughs] Let's get 'em!

Get it off, get it off! Get off!
I'm gonna eat ya!

[gasps] I was so worried.
They did it!

Get her! [laughs] Definitely get him!
Don't make me come back there!
[groans] Is everyone okay?
-Yep. -Just fine.
-Kind of. -All in one piece.

Only after we bite them.

We always worked better as a duet, right?
What a shock.

the butt fin! Then it's seven!

Why is six afraid of seven?

Sharks have no concept of arithmetic.

One move, and you're gonna get the shrimp.

translation.en: I, Claggart,
am in fact Switch's father's twin's evil son!

translation.en: Wouldn't that be his evil cous...?
Not coming with you was the biggest mistake of my life.

translation.en: -Oh! Back story! -Finally!
Well, you are a liar, a coward,
translation.it: Era ora! Sei un bugiardo, codardo, un tronfio figlio di tricheco.

translation.en: a proud, boastful, son-of-a-walrus.

Come on. Let's go.

translation.en: [distorted] Quinn!
[distorted] Quinn! Quinn!
A puny shark is no match for the...

What are they doing down there?

translation.en: [sighs] He's right.
-Wait, what? -Are you insane?
-Really? -You think Flicka can hold it together?

-[whimpering] -We can do this, Flicka.
I was minding my own business

Brothers and sisters.

I mean, do they live on land or in water?

If a group of floating lunchboxes can band together and threaten us,

translation.en: imagine what we can achieve together.

translation.en: -Shark legs! -Then we'll be the mammals!

More.
Five seals?
More!
Seven seals?

Seals for second breakfast.
Seals for elevenses.
Seals for luncheon.
-Seals for afternoon tea! -[squeals]

Seals for supper.
Seals, seals, seals!

Activate countermeasures?

Staring into the distance.
I do crossword puzzles.
Plotting betrayal, mostly.

Please, no, no!

Hm. Never heard of them.

I might not come back.

If we don't go on the sardine run, everyone will starve.

Quinn! Thank goodness!

Why did you come back?

-Is there anyone here...? -Brave.
-Stupid. -Crazy.
Let's do this.
The seals have a head start.

Here's the island. This is where the sardines will come past.

Uh... I thought the point of this thing was to not get eaten by sharks?

-Team Quinn! -Please! Team Geraldo!

-Quinn. -Geraldo. -What? -Huh?

I love you.
I love you.
Look behind you.
I really loved that watch.

-It's so cramped in here. -Yeah!

translation.en: We're packed like some kind of fish.
-Come on. Let's go. -Quiet.
-Silence. -Shut your face-holes!

We wait for the tasty seals to pass overhead.

[sniffs] ...we attack.
This year, no one's coming back from the sardine run.

translation.en: I think I have an idea.
Switch, can you release that container?
Even if I have to break the chain with my teeth. Ah.

As soon as that crate comes down, close the doors.

translation.en: Please?! Why do you hate me?
Move. Move!
Sorry, sorry.
Go, my love.
No ways.
I have spent my whole life proclaiming my bravery

translation.it: ma a fare il codardo quando conta davvero.

translation.en: [shouts] Not today!
If you don't come back, I will find you.
And I will hurt you!
I wouldn't expect any less, my love.

translation.en: [grunts] This puny door

translation.en: Sorry, my friends.
-This way! -Not this way!

translation.en: Why, hello there, little fellas.
Shut it, you creep!
Why always the eyes? [grunts]

No! No!
It's over, isn't it?
For all of us.
Well, this mission did have that classic, uh, certain death-y kind of feel to it.

Because of you, dummy.
My whole life I believed that it was every Beth for themselves.

translation.en: A very stupid way. But a better way.
[chuckles] We gotta look out for each other.
-No... -Matter...
What? Oh, oh! What.
Come on. Let's see if we can take down a few of those sharks with us.

translation.en: Told you a puny door is no match for the Great Geraldo.

translation.en: Why are we swimming?
♪ Swim, swim for your lives ♪
♪ Oh, yeah ♪
-That was shocking. -I'm electric, baby!
[deep voice] Activate Octo Suit.
Hey!
-You ready to get involved in this fight? -Roger, Roger!
Yeee-haw! Yeah, okay, maybe I shouldn't have done this!

translation.en: Ow!
Prepare to be astounded.
Prepare to be amazed.
Prepare to have your fins handed to you!

translation.en: By the Great Geraldo!
And the Magnificent Jing! [chuckles]
[chanting] Laser shark. Laser shark. Laser shark...
Laser shark. Laser shark. Laser shark.
Laser shark. Laser shark. Laser shark...
-[all] Boo! -You stink.
-Go home, loser! -That was it, Laser Shark?

translation.en: You're surrounded.
You're outnumbered.
You're about to be food.
Give it up, little fella. You can't win.
[sighs] I know. But we're brave, stupid and crazy enough to try anyway.
translation.it: Lo so, ma siamo così coraggiosi, stupidi e folli da provarci lo stesso.

translation.en: Sorry I'm late. I had to fetch reinforcements.

translation.en: [squeaks] It's go time!
-Mmm. Tasty. -Ow!
Every shark for themselves!
Everyone, get to the ship!
Not bad, pup. Not bad.
[sighs] I don't believe it. It's a shark. Come on, everybody. Let's help them.

translation.en: Yeah!
Are you guys with me? Are you with me?

translation.en: -We can do this together! -Yeah! [comical gibberish]
[grunts] Sharks will always be at the top!

translation.en: And you, you will always be food.
This food bites back!
[slow motion] No!
Oh, wait, I'm a shark. I'm totally fine!

translation.en: [squeals] Amateur.
Well, you did it, pup.
We did it.

Well, we're Seal Team!
Run away!
Psst! I wouldn't go there if I was you!

translation.en: I ain't afraid of no seals!
Wow. That guy is so done for.
Yup. Quinn's gonna kick his tailfin.

translation.en: Sierra, Hotel, Alpha, Romeo, Kilo, over.

translation.en: We've got incoming!
Let's go! Go! Go!
-Coming! -Flicka, come back here!
[squeals] It's go time!
All right, whose idea was the Dave cannon?

translation.en: [screams] It worked better on paper!
I thought that we agreed to stop listening to Quinn's plans?
translation.it: Non dovevamo ignorare i piani di Quinn?

translation.en: -Huh? -Hi! I'm Dave!
[presenter] You're tuned into Talky Talk radio. Next caller, please.
translation.it: RICERCA IN CORSO… Siete sintonizzati su Talky Talk Radio. Prossima chiamata.

translation.en: [Dave] Hi! I'm Dave!
[presenter] Oh, again?
Ooh, bad. Well, what's on your mind today?
[Dave] I just wanna talk about the portrayals of sharks in film and TV.
translation.it: Voglio parlare di come appaiono gli squali nei film e in TV.

translation.en: They make it seem like we just eat everything
translation.it: Fanno credere che mangiamo tutto quello su cui possiamo mettere le pinne,

translation.en: we can get our fins on.
translation.it: che mangiamo tutto quello su cui possiamo mettere le pinne,

translation.en: But that's totally not true! I only eat plankton!
translation.it: ma non è affatto vero. Io mangio solo plancton.

translation.en: And, uh, one time a little wooden boy by mistake.
translation.it: E una volta, un bambino di legno, per sbaglio.

translation.en: And a para-military unit of highly trained seals,
translation.it: E un'unità paramilitare di foche altamente addestrate,

translation.en: but that doesn't really count because I spat them out again!
translation.it: ma non conta perché le ho sputate.

translation.en: Also bicycle tires, a crab with a knife...
translation.it: E anche le gomme di una bicicletta. Un granchio con un coltello.

translation.en: Wow, he was really angry!
Definitely not barnacles!
Barnacles are the worst!
Uh, sea anemones, it's pronounced anemone, did you know that?
translation.it: Anemoni di mare. Si dice anemoni.+ Lo sapevate?

translation.en: My whole life I've had it wrong!
Oh, anyway, sea anemones.
D anemones. I think a G and an H anemone.
translation.it: Anemoni da amare, anemoni da sfamare.

translation.en: Couple of helmets, think probably like early, uh, Roman.
translation.it: Un paio di elmetti. Credo dell'antica Roma.

translation.en: Toothbrushes, very necessary this far down, let me tell ya.
translation.it: Spazzolini da denti. Essenziali quaggiù, ve lo dico io.

translation.en: A stick that kinda looked like a man,
translation.it: Un bastone che sembrava un uomo,

translation.en: like it was some kind of a stick-man.
Kinda hard to describe, but you're-- you're coming with me.
translation.it: È difficile da descrivere, ma voi venite con me.

translation.en: Oh, and like this crazy blue diamond that just floated down one day, huh.
translation.it: E un diamante blu pazzesco che un giorno, è caduto giù.

translation.en: Hope somebody's not missing that!
translation.it: Spero che qualcuno non lo cerchi.

translation.en: [Dave] A bag of flour, some cocoa powder,
translation.it: Un sacco di farina, cacao in polvere,

translation.en: bicarb soda, baking powder,
white sugar, salt, eggs, milk, oil, vanilla extract.
translation.it: zucchero bianco, sale, uova, latte, olio, estratto di vaniglia.

translation.en: It was only afterwards that I realized
that I had all the ingredients for a chocolate cake.
translation.it: che avevo gli ingredienti per una torta al cioccolato.

translation.en: I wish I had mixed them first.
